short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears cache, history, passwords, and site data, then reloads the current tab to perform cache free operations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension help you to clear Caches,Cookies,History and Download history and much more. Also, it reloads the current tab after clearing to make developers/testers to test the application quickly without any cache holding problems.
